name: Death is on the Way
overview: The ancient Japan. A land of magic and mystery, a land of betrayals and friendships. In those distant days, two families fought for the control of the land. The Tuzobako family, a family of samurais and the Yatekoji, a ninja family. Among the members of these families were two young men: Kojiro Tuzobako and Yamimoto Yatekoji, unlike their parents, they were not interested in war. They were romantics, and when they came of age they traveled around the world. While away, an evil warlord named Tunami decided to conquer the land of their families. And so he did, killing everyone in the process... Hearing of the carnage, the two banded together to defeat this powerful, common enemy. Game also released on Amiga Classix 3 compilation.
